btv.download.message

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.download.message.Message
      • btv.download.message.Request

  • public class Request
extends Message
    This class represents a Peer wire Request message. Peers send request messages when they want to receive a piece of the file.
    See Also:
    Message

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class btv.download.message.Message

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(int id,
       int len,
       byte[] payload)
        This constructor is used when we receive a Request from a peer.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of this message
        len - The length of this message.
        payload - The payload of this message.

      • Request

        public Request(int id,
       int len,
       int i,
       int b,
       int bl)
        This constructor is used to set up a new Request message.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of this message.
        len - The length of this message.
        i - The index of the piece to request.
        b - The offset of the piece to request.
        bl - The length of the piece to request.

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
        The offset of the piece to request.

      • getBlockLength

        public int getBlockLength()
        Returns:
        The length of the piece to request.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Used to check if one Request is the same as another. Two requests are the same if they hold the same piece index and offset.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The Request to compare this Request to.
        Returns:
        True if the requests are equal, false otherwise.
